con:testCase.name: Good Case-TASK-MOW-Verification
con:testCase.con:description:
Based on requirements in us: https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-3755
This test-case tests Maintenance of Workflows for the below JobActions : OCS_EXTERNAL_NOTIFICATION PPIT_NOTIFY_PAIN008_TRANSACTION SEND_EMAIL PPIT_NOTIFY_CAMT054_TRANSACTION BALANCE_CHECK_AFTER_REGISTRATION
Note: Execution only in suite after all test-cases before are executed.
Precondition: 1) Execution of Good Case-CAMT054-MOW-Verification and is successful.
Test-scenario:
WorkFlow maintenance verification for the TASK JobActions Date Source and Loop to verify the Workflow maintenance for the above JobActions Execute the operation getWorkflowMaintenanceData with the required job name and valid date range. Number of modified entries should be 0 before the update Update the Status and the error code for the transaction based on the data from DataSource step. Execute the operation getWorkflowMaintenanceData with the required job name from Data Source step. Number of modified entries count should be 1 in the response. Simulation of resetting as in GUI â€“ Execute operation resetWorkflowMaintenanceData with job name and valid comments. Success response should be received. Execute the operation getWorkflowMaintenanceData with the required job name and valid date range. Number of modified entries shown as 0 in the response. Validate that the status and error codes are reset in the database as per the DataSource.
Postcondition: The data created is deleted from TASK and CAMT05400102_INPUT_ENTRY tables
Acceptance criteria:
Tests are implemented, executed and passed. All validation from points before are presented for review in review meeting. MOW for the working as reset from DRC GUI.

con:config.con:query: SELECT DISTINCT TASK_TYPE_ID FROM TASK WHERE LAST_PROPAGATION_DATE >= to_date('${=java.time.LocalDateTime.now().format(java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern( "yyyy-MM-dd 00:00:00"))}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND ID > ${#TestSuite#MAXIDTASK} ORDER BY TASK_TYPE_ID ASC

con:request.name: resetWorkflowMaintenanceData-TASK-Before
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:type="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:v1="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <v1:resetWorkflowMaintenanceData> <!--type: string--> <jobActionId>${Data Source-TASK-JOB#JobAction}</jobActionId> <timeFrame> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: dateTime--> <fromDate>${=java.time.LocalDateTime.now().format(java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern( "yyyy-MM-dd'T'00:00:00"))}</fromDate> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: dateTime--> <toDate>${=java.time.LocalDateTime.now().plusDays(1).format(java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss"))}</toDate> </timeFrame> <!--type: string--> <comment>per auras</comment> </v1:resetWorkflowMaintenanceData> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.con:query:
SELECT * FROM TASK WHERE ID > ${#TestSuite#MAXIDTASK} AND TASK_TYPE_ID = ${Data Source-TASK-JOB#TaskType}
STATUS IN ('SUCCESSFUL', 'NEW') AND LAST_PROPAGATION_DATE >= to_date('${=java.time.LocalDateTime.now().format(java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern( "yyyy-MM-dd 00:00:00"))}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ORDER BY ID DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

con:request.name: resetWorkflowMaintenanceData-TASK
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:type="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:v1="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <v1:resetWorkflowMaintenanceData> <!--type: string--> <jobActionId>${Data Source-TASK-JOB#JobAction}</jobActionId> <timeFrame> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: dateTime--> <fromDate>${=java.time.LocalDateTime.now().format(java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern( "yyyy-MM-dd'T'00:00:00"))}</fromDate> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: dateTime--> <toDate>${=java.time.LocalDateTime.now().plusDays(1).format(java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss"))}</toDate> </timeFrame> <!--type: string--> <comment>per auras</comment> </v1:resetWorkflowMaintenanceData> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: DELETE FROM CAMT05400102_INPUT_ENTRY WHERE ID > ${#TestSuite#MAXIDCAMT} AND ID <= ${#TestSuite#MAXIDCAMT_After}
DELETE FROM TASK WHERE ID > ${#TestSuite#MAXIDTASK} AND ID <= ${#TestSuite#MAXIDTASK_After}
